data.body:
The current console search and navigation needs a different approach.

- remove current navigation components
- add pulldown to select interaction (app request type of initial, verificaton, follow-up - timestamp)
- show interactions in time order

- add "type" filters - these should be pre-indexed by the backend to aid in filtering agent responses.

data.title: History View: Console search and navigation upgrade
